webpage.title: Habitat for Humanity London
webpage.article:
Habitat for Humanity London puts 100% of your donation towards building homes in the London area. Funding for building supplies and land is our greatest need. There are a number of ways to donate, so choose one that's most convenient for you. Contact us if you have any questions, and please give generously.
Donate Online You can make a donation online right now. It's fast, easy and secure. Click here to make a one time donation or to set up monthly donations. Securities can also be donated, such as stocks or mutual funds.
Donate By Telephone If you would like to organize your donation over the phone, or if you have questions, please contact Irene Stocker at 519-455-6623 extension 230.
Donate By Mail
You can also write a tax-deductable cheque payable to Habitat for Humanity London Inc. and mail it to our head offices at the following address.
Habitat for Humanity London Inc.
Unit 10, 45 Pacific Ct,
London, ON, N5V 3N4.
Donor Bill of Rights
As a donor, you deserve to be informed about how your contribution is put to use. See the Donor Bill of Rights adopted by the National Board of Habitat for Humanity Canada.
